snippet: Zebra Katz’s career is gaining momentum after his song “Ima Read” played for roughly 11 minutes at the Rick Owens show during Paris Fashion Week.
abstract: Performance artist and rapper Zebra Katz’s career is gaining momentum after his song Ima Read played for roughly 11 minutes at the Rick Owens show during Paris Fashion Week.
